message:
Dear {{ expense_approver_name or employee_name }},

{{ employee_name }} has submitted a new Expense Claim for approval.

{% if can_approve %}

You have been assigned as the Expense Approver for this claim. Please review and take necessary action at your earliest convenience.

{% else %}

This is an informational notification. No action is required from your side.

{% endif %}

Regards,
Finance Team
name: Expense Claim Send For Approval Notification
subject: Expense Claim Submitted by {{ employee_name }} for Approval
